section.section: Except as provided in paragraph (2) of this subsection, the owner of a vehicle subject to registration under this subtitle shall apply to the Administration for the registration of the vehicle in a manner that the Administration requires.
The application for registration of a low speed vehicle shall be made by electronic transmission under § 13-610 of this title.

text.section: The application shall contain the information that the Administration reasonably requires to determine if the vehicle is entitled to registration.

If a licensed dealer holds a low speed vehicle for sale and transfers the vehicle to a person other than another licensed dealer, the dealer shall:
Obtain from the transferee a completed application;
Collect all fees required to register the low speed vehicle under this subtitle; and
Within 30 days of the date of delivery of the low speed vehicle, electronically transmit the application and fees in accordance with § 13-610 of this title.
